title: Creative Collaboration Competency Development Program through Collaborative Music Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory knowledge and no instrumental performance experience
context.additional_context: Course for science students to develop creativity and teamwork skills through collaborative music projects. Operated via cross-school exchanges, primarily composed of non-majors.

learning_goals: Students complete at least three cross-school collaborative projects through cooperative learning
Learners complete at least 80% of microlearning content provided on mobile platforms
Participating students apply at least two scientific principles (e.g., acoustical physics) in the music production process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
